column5: Driving to Ohio, Sandusky this weekend. Looking to stalk up Mercury OptiMax engine oil. Will be driving pass Buffalo along HWY 90. Pennsylvania, Ohio and Michigan. Anyone knows marina that would sell Optimax engine oil some what close along the highway?   Appreciate your help!
You could try Brobiel Marine or West Marine they are both just across the border in Buffalo .

Fran Brobeil only deals in Evinrude and Yammy's........but Gander Mountain in Tonawanda, NY cares it...not far and you would go almost right by it if you take the Rainbow Bridge over...see here....  http://www.gandermountain.com/modperl/storelocator.cgi?r=storeDetails&storeID=251
